Title: PM Modi EXCLUSIVE: Why is BJP eyeing 'Abki Baar 400 Paar' in Lok Sabha polls? PM explains amid Oppn criticism
Summary: PM Modi gave an Exclusive interview to India TV ahead of filing his nomination papers in Varanasi. He explained why the BJP is raising the slogan "Abki Baar 400 Paar".

Title: PM Modi interview HIGHLIGHTS: Opposition destroyed its image due to negative approach, PM to India TV
Summary: PM Modi Interview: The seven-phase Lok Sabha polls kicked off on April 19 with the counting of votes set to take place on June 4 as Prime Minister Narendra Modi makes a bid for a third consecutive term in office.

Title: Lok Sabha Elections 2024 Phase 4: ‘Vote to strengthen our democracy,' says PM Modi as polling begins
Summary: Lok Sabha Elections 2024: Polling is underway in 96 constituencies in the fourth phase of Lok Sabha elections. As well as voting for Andhra Pradesh and Odisha Assembly polls are also underway.

Title: Assembly polls in Andhra Pradesh, Odisha: Voting held to elect new state govts | DETAILS
Summary: Assembly Elections: Andhra Pradesh and Odisha are polling simultaneously for the Assembly and Lok Sabha Elections on Monday.

Title: Lok Sabha Elections 2024 HIGHLIGHTS: 62.84 per cent voter turnout reported in fourth phase of polling
Summary: Lok Sabha Elections Phase 4: Sporadic incidents of violence marred the fourth phase of Lok Sabha polls in the eight parliamentary constituencies of West Bengal as TMC and BJP workers clashed in various areas under Birbhum and Bardhaman-Durgapur Lok Sabha seats.

Title: Lok Sabha Elections 2024 Phase 4: List of 96 constituencies, states, parties and candidates
Summary: Lok Sabha Elections 2024: 96 constituencies are going for polls in the fourth phase on May 13. Voters in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Bihar, West Bengal, Jharkhand, Odisha and Jammu and Kashmir will use their franchise in the fourth phase.

Title: Jharkhand: Blast rocks Palamu hours before voting, 4 dead
Summary: While the cause of explosion is still unclear, the investigation has been started by the local police. Four fatalities have been reported, including 3 minors.

Title: Lok Sabha elections 2024: Voting for 96 Lok Sabha constituencies, all Andhra Assembly seats today | DETAILS
Summary: Lok Sabha elections 2024: A total of 1,717 candidates are in the fray in the Lok Sabha seats and more than 19 lakh polling officials have been deployed at 1.92 lakh polling stations for the over 17.70 crore eligible voters, including 8.73 crore women, in the fourth phase of Lok Sabha elections.

Title: Andhra Pradesh elections: 175 Assembly seats, 25 Lok Sabha seats to go for voting today
Summary: Entire Lok Sabha and Assembly seats in Andhra Pradesh will go to polls in a single phase on May 13. The result will be declared on June 4.

Title: Haryana: Khattar dares opposition to parade its MLAs, says BJP govt not averse to floor test
Summary: The Congress, JJP and the INLD approached Governor Bandaru Dattatreya, seeking the dismissal of the "minority" government in Haryana.

Title: Kharge sharpens his attack on PM Modi, Amit Shah, says 'Dalits, tribals to become slaves again if...'
Summary: Ahead of the fourth phase of Lok Sabha elections, Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge intensified his attacks on Prime Minister Narendra Modi. In his fresh attack, he claimed if PM Modi returns to power again the Dalit and Tribals will be treated like slaves.

Title: Jharkhand cash haul: ED issues summons to minister Alamgir Alam
Summary: The summons to the Congress leader and Jharkhand minister were issued following the arrest of his PS Sanjeel Lal and his domestic help, from whose house house huge cash of over Rs. 35 crore was recovered.

Title: Uttarakhand: MeT dept issues orange alert for hailstorms in five districts | DETAILS
Summary: Uttarakhand weather update:  A yellow alert has also been issued for the rest of the districts during the period, it said, adding the administration should take all precautionary measures to ensure the safety of people.

Title: Modi launches 'waaris' attack on Opposition, day after Kejriwal's 'who will be your PM' charge at BJP | VIDEO
Summary: PM Narendra Modi attacked the Opposition in West Bengal and said that their leaders are "looting" the people of the country to build their mansions for their heirs. His remarks came a day after Arvind Kejriwal attacked the BJP over PM face after Modi turns 75 next year.

Title: Lok Sabha Elections 2024: From Akhilesh Yadav to Giriraj Singh to Mahua Moitra, key candidates in Phase 4
Summary: Lok Sabha Elections 2024: The fourth phase of the Lok Sabha Elections 2024 will be held on May 13 (Monday) in which voters in 96 constituencies will use their franchise. 10 states and Union Territories including Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Maharashtra and UP will go to polls in the fourth phase.

Title: Land scam case: Supreme Court to hear Hemant Soren’s plea against arrest in ED case on Monday
Summary: Land scam case: ED is probing the alleged huge amounts of proceeds of crime generated by manipulation of official records by showing dummy sellers and purchasers in the guise of forged/bogus documents to acquire huge parcels of land having value in crores.

Title: Congress claims Kharge's helicopter checked in Bihar, says poll officials targeting opposition leaders
Summary: Lok Sabha Elections 2024: A Congress leader shared a video to claim that the chief electoral officer of Bihar is herself monitoring Kharge's helicopter checking in Samastipur. The video showed a helicopter with officials, including from police, around it.

Title: Assam: Couple abandons 4-year-old daughter in Tinsukia, heads to join ULFA-I, say sources
Summary: The couple is reportedly on their way to ULFA-I bases in Myanmar, the sources said. However, the police refused to comment on this development, saying, “We have to investigate the whole thing first.”

Title: 'Is he PM candidate of INDI alliance?': Smriti Irani's dig at Rahul Gandhi on debate challenge to PM Modi
Summary: Lok Sabha Elections 2024: Smriti Irani mocked Rahul Gandhi after he accepted an invitation to debate with Prime Minister Narendra Modi on the Lok Sabha polls.

Title: BSF recovers China-made drone near International Border in Punjab's Amritsar
Summary: According to the officials, the BSF recovered the drone from a farming field from the Hardo Rattan village in the border area of Amritsar district.

Title: Bhagwant Mann has ‘understanding’ with Amit Shah to split AAP after Lok Sabha polls, claims SAD chief Badal
Summary: Badal alleged that Bhagwant Mann has compromised with the BJP and opened channels with both the BJP and the Congress to hedge his bet.

Title: Char Dham Yatra 2024: Badrinath Dham opens for devotees after gap of six months | VIDEO
Summary: Char Dham Yatra 2024: The Char Dham Yatra, steeped in profound spiritual significance in Hinduism, unfolds a journey of devotion and introspection, traversing the sacred realms of Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath, and Badrinath, culminating in spiritual rejuvenation and divine communion.
